text: Mass Effect 2 is a video game for Microsoft Windows, Xbox 360, and PlayStation 3. It is made by Electronic Arts. It is the sequel to Mass Effect and comes before Mass Effect 3. It is an action role-playing game. It is a third-person shooter game. ==Gameplay== Save data from the first game can be used to influence choices made in this game. ==Reception== The game was critically acclaimed. ==Other websites== * Category:2010 video games Category:Action role-playing video games Category:BioWare games Category:Electronic Arts video games Category:LGBT-related video games Category:Mass Effect Category:Microsoft video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:Role- playing video games Category:Science fiction video games Category:Single- player video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about terrorism Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games
title: Mass Effect 2
